arts.ttl: Man Utd news: Matheus Cunha's behaviour comes to light as Brazilian star nears ban
arts.sum: Manchester United and Ruben Amorim will hope to string three victories together when they face Brighton in the Premier League on Saturday

arts.ttl: Matheus Cunha making clear Man Utd dressing room impression after Wolves warning
arts.sum: Matheus Cunha joined Manchester United in the summer and has impressed since his arrival, despite having been warned that he could be a 'prickly' character
